text: Europium halide is a compound of the rare earth metal europium and a halogen. The following compounds are known. *europium(II) fluoride *Europium(III) fluoride *Europium(II) chloride *Europium(III) chloride *Europium(II) bromide *Europium(III) bromide *Europium(II) iodide *Europium(III) iodide
title: Europium halide
